actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to require States whose State-chartered financial institutions cause disproportionate Federal insurance losses due to inadequate State regulation, to pay an insurance premium as a condition of future deposit insurance.

summary.text: Deposit Insurance Protection Act of 1991 - Amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to require a State whose State-chartered financial institutions cause disproportionate Federal insurance losses due to inadequate State regulation to pay high-risk insurance premiums.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to require States whose State-chartered financial institutions cause disproportionate Federal insurance losses due to inadequate State regulation, to pay an insurance premium as a condition of future deposit insurance.
